text: Pamela Pereira (born 25 April 1988) is a Brazilian Paralympic sitting volleyball player. She is part of the Brazil women's national sitting volleyball team. She won the bronze medal, Brazil's first in the sport, at the 2016 Summer Paralympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, after defeating the Ukrainian women's national sitting volleyball team by 3 sets to 0, and the silver medal at the 2019 Parapan American Games. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Brazil
